document_data.mainbody:
auden Ebon was a Dark Justiciars of Shar and a member of the Gauntlet of Shar in the 10 century DR.
Ebon was among hundreds of Dark Justiciars and Sel√ªnites who died in a bitter battle between the followers of the two goddesses in the . Justiciar Ebon was wounded and bled out in battle, and the casualty was recorded in a long log of the dead penned by Malus Thorm of Reithwin.
As of the , Lauden Ebons death was long forgotten, being just one of an endless list of the dead, stored in Malus Thorms House of Healing in the shadow-cursed town of Reithwin.
